mapper.select: select (SELECT SUM(cnt) AS TotalMonthlyLoginCount FROM ( SELECT LEFT(createDate, 6) AS createDateMonth, COUNT(DISTINCT createDate) AS cnt FROM statistc.requestinfo GROUP BY createDateMonth ) AS MonthlyLoginCounts) / (SELECT COUNT(createDateMonth) AS UniqueMonthsCount FROM ( SELECT LEFT(createDate, 6) AS createDateMonth FROM statistc.requestinfo GROUP BY createDateMonth ) AS MonthlyGrouped)
